tool_description: Dicolink API lets you retrieve information about French words, including definitions, synonyms, antonyms, quotes, expressions, lexical field, scrabble score, and much more...
name: Dicolink
title: Dicolink

api_list.name: Get Definitions

required_parameters.name: mot
required_parameters.description: Set the word you want to search

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dicolink.p.rapidapi.com/mot/cheval/definitions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dicolink.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dicolink.p.rapidapi.com/mot/{mot}/definitions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dicolink.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Lexical Field
api_list.description: Get Lexical Field for a word

api_list.name: Get Antonyms
api_list.description: Get antonyms of a specific word

api_list.name: Get Citations

required_parameters.name: mot
required_parameters.description: Set the word you want to search

api_list.name: Get Expressions

api_list.name: Get Scrabble score
api_list.description: Get Scrabble score for a word
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dicolink.p.rapidapi.com/mot/cheval/scorescrabble"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dicolink.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
